Auto Dosa Machine Other products by Type: Meat Processing Machinery FOB Price: US $ 7,600 - 7,800 / Unit Get Latest Price Port: Chennai Port Minimum Order Quantity: 1 Unit/Units Supply Ability: 8 Unit/Units per Month Payment Terms: L/C,Western Union Mr. Krishnan G Unverified Company Sri Venkateswara Industries [ India ]
Contact Details View this Supplier's Website See larger image: Auto Dosa Machine Report Suspicious Activity Suspicious activities include posting prohibited/restricted item, fraud, etc. Add to My Favorites Online Showroom: 4 Products Similar Products from this Supplier Product Details Company Profile Quick Details Place of Origin: Tamil Nadu India Brand Name: Auto Dosa Machine Model Number: BDM - 1200 Type: Kitchen Equipments Packaging&Delivery Packaging Detail: packaging will be extra Delivery Detail: within 45 days from the confirmed purchase order Specifications Auto Dosa Machine
This Machine is designed to produce 360-400 dosa's per hour with 1 trained operator.our machines are widely accepted by college Institutions,Marriage Halls,Party halls,Industrial canteens,Hospitals,Military Canteens,etc., The oil and gas consumption is very less. We are one of the pioneer manufacturer of food&starch extruders. Our company is managed by professional engineers having experience more than 30 years in this field.
We are one of the leading manufacturers of Extruted Food items like, Corn puffs, Cheese Balls&Kurkure. Recently we have developed a twin screw extruder complete fine to produce cornflakes&chacos. The above plant is working successfully.
Presently we have involved our self for the production of Food processing machines like ... View more >>
